title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the sets v(t)=0

1 point is earned for the direction change at t=1,2

1 point is earned for the interval with reason

v(t)=0

t 2 −3t+3=1 t 2 −3t+2=0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaacaWG0b WaaWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaaaaOGaeyOeI0IaaG4maiaadshacqGHRaWk caaIZaGaeyypa0JaaGymaaqaaiaadshadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaa GccqGHsislcaaIZaGaamiDaiabgUcaRiaaikdacqGH9aqpcaaIWaaa aaa@45D9@

(t-2)(t-1)=0

t=1, 2

v(t)>0 for 0<t<1

v(t)<0 for 1<t<2

v(t)>0 for 2<t<5

The particle changes direction when t=1 and t=2.

The particle travels to the left when 1<t<2.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the sets v(t)=0

1 point is earned for the direction change at t=1,2

1 point is earned for the interval with reason
